Wisdom: يَسِّرُوا وَلَا تُعَسِّرُوا وَخَفِّفُوا وَلَا تُثَقِّلُوا
enWisdom: Make [matters] easy and not arduous; make [them] light and not strenuous
Loss is [a cause of] sorrows
Good health is the best blessing
Well-being is the most pleasant of blessings
Well-being is the better of the two attires
Good health is the more salubrious of the two delights

Wisdom: الْعَوَافِي [الْعَافِيَةُ] إِذَا دَامَتْ جُهِلَتْ وَإِذَا فُقِدَتْ عُرِفَتْ
enWisdom: Good health is such that when it lasts, it is disregarded and when it is lost, its value is known
Walk with your ailment as long as you can
The most bountiful share is good health
Through well-being, life becomes pleasurable
With good health, enjoyment becomes complete
With good health, there is delight in the taste [of food]

Wisdom: تَوَقَّوُا الْبَرْدَ فِي أَوَّلِهِ وَتَلَقَّوْهُ فِي آخِرِهِ فَإِنَّهُ يَفْعَلُ فِي الْأَبْدَانِ كَمَا يَفْعَلُ فِي الْأَغْصَانِ أَوَّلُهُ يُحْرِقُ وَآخِرُهُ يُورِقُ
enWisdom: Be cautious of the cold [of winter] at its onset and embrace it towards its ending, for it acts upon the bodies as it acts upon the branches its beginning scorches and its end causes leaves to grow
The garment of well-being is the most pleasant of attires

Wisdom: دَوَامُ الْعَافِيَةِ أَهْنَأُ عَطِيَّةٍ وَأَفْضَلُ قِسْمٍ
enWisdom: Lasting good health is the most pleasant gift and the best portion
Physical health is one of the most wholesome bounties

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَغْتَرُّ بِسَلَامَةِ جِسْمٍ مُعَرَّضٍ لِلْآفَاتِ
enWisdom: How can one be deceived by the health of a body that is prone to malady?

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَكُونُ مَنْ يَفْنَى بِبَقَائِهِ وَيَسْقُمُ بِصِحَّتِهِ وَيُؤْتَى مِنْ مَأْمَنِهِ
enWisdom: (When he was asked ‘how are you O Am?r al-Mu’min?n?’, he replied: ) How would he be whom life is driving towards death, whose state of health can be changed to sickness at any moment and who can be approached [by death] from his place of safety?!
There is no remedy for the one who is fond of his ailment

Wisdom: لَا شِفَاءَ لِمَنْ كَتَمَ طَبِيبَهُ دَاءَهُ
enWisdom: There is no cure for the one who hides his ailment from his doctor
Good health and gluttony do not go together
NULL
There is no preservation more averting [of harm] than security [that is granted by Allah]
Youthfulness and senility do not go together
Strong determination and lavishness do not go together
Good health is not attained except through a good diet
There is no attire more appealing than security [and well-being]

Wisdom: لَا رَزِيَّةَ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ دَوَامِ سُقْمِ الْجَسَدِ
enWisdom: There is no affliction greater than the unrelenting physical ailment
There is no life more pleasant than [life] with good health
There is no attire better than well-being
